detaileddescription.para: This function is responsible for constructing the detector geometry by defining materials, constructing various volumes such as the world volume, water tank, cryostats, liquid xenon, and fiducial volume. It also initializes the gamma ray helper class with the defined materials.

simplesect.para: The physical volume of the world.

detaileddescription.para: Constructs the inner cryostat and fills it with LXe.
Constructs the liquid xenon volume in the detector.
Constructs the liquid xenon fiducial volume.
